de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.statistics
Class Statistics

java.lang.Object
  de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.statistics.Statistics
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Statistics
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class holds game wide statistics about all actions within the game in:

  1. Global statistic are hold in gameStatistic which is a GameStatistics object
  2. or by units unitStatistics or
  3. by single players playersStatistics.

Units and players are a set of unique statistics identified by name. Therefore they are represented by a Hashtable which identifies them by String (their name) and holds an object of type SingleStatistic.

The class constructor also handles internally automatically persistence for the statistics.

A file is created in the project root with name FILE_NAME.

See Also:

          The constructor will try to load an existing statistics, if it's not found it will create a new file.
